title: Muting friends ingame leads to you being removed from their friendslist?
body:
So I was playing Nunubot and two friends decided to mute me to stop the laugh. I am assuming they had me muted all game, and come the end, I was removed from their friends list.

Was this always a function/feature?

replies.body: A very long time ago, muting a player in-game would indeed remove them from your friends list.  I think that was changed a while ago, though!  I just tested this out with a friend, and everything looks fine.  He was still in my friends list!  If you are able to reproduce this, let our QA team know about it on the [Bug Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)!  Thanks for the heads up.

It was through a full game on summoners rift. We were on the same team and both people muted me.

Here is the match it occurred in. 

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2319790577/44223956?tab=overview

Also, I just found another bug. The "Copy URL to clipboard" In the client fails to work.

Chelsie had me muted since 1 minute due to the nunubot laugh, all the way to 37:03

It kicked in sometime along the way because when I got out of the game, it showed she was still in game and was no longer on my friendslist.

Shouldn't be too difficult to reproduce.
